General.Name: Legacy Iron Ore Ltd
General.Description: Legacy Iron Ore Limited engages in the exploration, evaluation, and development of mineral properties in Australia. It primarily explores for iron ore, gold, base metals, tungsten, and manganese, as well as rare earth metals. The company's projects include the Mt Bevan iron ore project, and Pilbara iron ore and manganese projects located in Western Australia; the South Laverton gold project located in the South Laverton region; and the East Kimberley project located in the Halls Creek area. The company was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Perth, Australia. Legacy Iron Ore Limited operates as a subsidiary of NMDC Limited.

2.Name: Mr. Benjamin Patrick Donovan A.C.I.S., B.Com., B.Comm (Hons)
2.Title: Company Sec.
